content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a legal case involving the division of joint assets between two parties referred to as sk and vk the court issued a final resolution after a duration of 1 year and 4 months the joint assets involved in the case include two apartments a portion of a property and a car the court divided the assets assigning one apartment and the car to sk and the other apartment and a portion of the property to vk sk is required to compensate vk with 8000 euros and vk is required to compensate sk with 7850 euros the court also settled mutual financial claims and ordered sk to give consent for a change in ownership of one of the apartments the court also addressed a request for the deletion of a specific entry made by one party against another party the court requested the parties to consider reaching a compromise and a compromise was eventually reached the court announced the judgment publicly and the parties submitted requests and additions regarding procedural costs and the division of assets the court evaluated the evidence and made decisions based on applicable laws the court also considered the living arrangements and the parties interests in the division of assets the court distributed the procedural costs based on the extent of claim satisfaction and the provisions of the civil code

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
